Name: Observers
About the game: Story When the treasury of the United Friends Organization explodes and all of their cosmic diamonds scatter across the galaxy, it is up to the Observers to recollect them all! Gameplay Play with your friends as one of the four Observers, Blili, Glord, Wiezni, or Sragpoo, each with their own unique ability to master. Combine your abilities and find unique solutions to reach the diamond in each level. What there is... - There is 4 Players controls for a single keyboard - There is controller support What there is not... - There is no online multiplayer, however there is remote play. Other - Roughly 1 hour of gameplay. Depending on how good you are. Contact singleshoo@gmail.com Website shoostudios.netlify.com
